comment: I really love this app, truly! But there is one thing that is really bugging me. The lag... When I put an effect it lags, like really lags, and when i play a video it lags too and it doesn't align with the music, it's quite annoying I'll be honest with you. I really hope this will be fix because I really love this app, like really really love! This would be the best video editing if you fixed the lag in my opinion.
scenarios: When I put an effect, it lags.
key sentence: When I put an effect, it lags.
the function of activity: The activity includes exporting, editing, managing audio, adding media, controlling playback, reversing vedio, adjusting visuals, applying transition, applying effects, adjusting speed and enhancing projects.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Search', 'description': 'Use the search feature to locate specific elements or functions on the screen.'}, {'name': 'Back', 'description': 'Return to the previous screen or menu using the back button.'}, {'name': 'Export', 'description': 'Export your project or file using the export button.'}, {'name': 'Mute Clip Audio', 'description': 'Mute the audio of a selected clip using the mute button.'}, {'name': 'Cover Edit', 'description': 'Edit the cover image or section of your project.'}, {'name': 'Play/Pause', 'description': 'Control playback of media with the play/pause button.'}, {'name': 'withdraw', 'description': 'Undo previous step.'}, {'name': 'Cancel withdrawal', 'description': 'Cancel withdrawal.'}, {'name': 'Add Element/clip', 'description': 'Add a new photo/vedio to your project using the add button.'}, {'name': 'Audio Track', 'description': 'Manage audio tracks within your project.'}, {'name': 'Edit Options', 'description': 'Access various edit functions for the project.'}, {'name': 'Overlay Options', 'description': 'Manage overlays in your project.'}, {'name': 'Text Options', 'description': 'Edit text elements within your project.'}, {'name': 'Effects Options', 'description': 'Apply or manage effects in your project.'}, {'name': 'Captions Options', 'description': 'Edit or add captions to your project.'}, {'name': 'Aspect Ratio Options', 'description': 'Adjust the aspect ratio of your project.'}]
